short_summary: Correctional Services Canada requires three (3) Forklifts.
description: The Correctional Service of Canada has a requirement for three (3) Forklifts. This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A. If you wish to become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, refer to: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-79868. As a requirement of the SA, this notice is published on Buyandsell.gc.ca for a period of fifteen (15) calendar days. The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is on or before March 31st, 2024.
full_summary:
### Forklifts Tender Announcement

**Reference Information**

* Reference Number: CB-634-82324931
* Solicitation Number: 21120-24-4502652
* Amendment Number: 4
* Publication Date: November 24, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 5, 2023, at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

**About this Tender**

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking proposals for the rental or purchase of three (3) forklifts. This tender opportunity is open to suppliers holding a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A.

Suppliers interested in this opportunity should consult the [Buy and Sell website](https://buyandsell.gc.ca) for more information.

### Important Documents

The [notice of requirement](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25778/4502652---nature-of-requirements-sa---en-fr.pdf) document outlines the detailed requirements for this tender.

### Contact Information

If you have any questions or require additional information, please contact Stéphanie Gigoux at [stephanie.gigoux@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:stephanie.gigoux@csc-scc.gc.ca).

### Tender Status

This tender is now expired, and any bids will no longer be accepted.

You may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of notification that your bid was unsuccessful.

### Trade Agreements

This opportunity is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) You will not be contacted
